201210000.text: I am curious, {NICKNAME}. Having traveled so many places before, have you come encountered divination before?

201210001.text: The Xianzhou Luofu uses the Matrix of Prescience to make predictions about the future

201210002.text: You mean the Divination Commission, right... I have heard tales of them before.

201210003.text: I think the Stellaron Hunters have this ability, too.

201210004.text: You mean that Destiny's Slave... Say no more.

201210005.text: Everyone has their own beliefs when it comes to divination methods. If you ask me, I believe you can predict a person's future using only their memories.

201210006.text: This method of divination is based on a law of life, that we are constantly living under the influence of our pasts.

201210007.text: The deeper the memory is carved into someone's mind, the more complete and original it is, the clearer the trajectory of the destiny that leads from it.

201210008.text: Well, would you like to try?

201210009.text: There are lots of things that I do not remember...

201210010.text: Yes, you and that March 7th are very special...

201210011.text: As neither of you have any memories for me to divine from, why don't you take the lead and use this method to perform a divination using someone else's memories?

201210012.text: There is a reason for every word we speak, you must simply just say what is in your heart.

201210013.text: I shall describe a memory to you, you can make predictions about the future based on it as you please.

201210015.text: Then I'm going to be bold and make some predictions!

201210017.text: Then I'm going to be bold and make some predictions!

201210019.text: "A young girl wanders alone, observing the influence that the past has had on the reality of different worlds and recording those fleeting moments that went overlooked."

201210020.text: What kind of future do you think the owner of this memory is headed towards?

201210021.text: Being able to roam alone throughout different worlds, she must be a considerably powerful person

201210022.text: She enjoys observing the lives of others but is still able to leave without causing a disturbance. I imagine she is an attentive and optimistic person

201210023.text: So, I imagine that she will live happily, no matter what happens

201210024.text: If she spends the rest of her life as nothing more than an observer from the sidelines, I imagine her life will be very bland

201210025.text: Perhaps she will continue like this until she reaches the end of her life, before leaving in silence with no one to remember her

201210026.text: If she continues to wander the cosmos alone like this, she will inevitably encounter a lot of danger

201210027.text: It is very likely that she will lose her life along this journey one day

201210028.text: Also, if she spends her entire life as a bystander and observer, I imagine she will be very lonely

201210029.text: I'm glad I was able to hear your thoughts. Not bad.

201210030.text: Did that give you a sense of the power within memories? It leads to the future and allows us to catch a glimpse of the whole picture... However, keep in mind that the future can also change, never forget that.

201210031.text: So, who is the owner of this memory? What is her future like?

201210032.text: She may be someone you know, she may also just be a passing figure in your life.

201210033.text: Ah, another customer for divination. Talk to you again, soon!
